name: munger
description: probably should have just learned sed

scripts.test: npx tsc; node test.js; node filetest.js
scripts.build: npx tsc         &&       npx esbuild --bundle          --outfile=ui/bundle.js ui/ui.js &&                                                       npx tsc --build --clean
scripts.build:prod: npx tsc         &&       npx esbuild --bundle --minify --outfile=ui/bundle.js ui/ui.js && node build/embed.js ui/munger.html dist/index.html && npx tsc --build --clean
scripts.watch: start npx tsc --watch && start npx esbuild --bundle --watch  --outfile=ui/bundle.js ui/ui.js && start ui/munger.html

author: Tom Theisen
